20110128140245.000|20110128140247.000|CC1|WE WERE WATCHING A LARGE GROUP  
20110128140247.000|20110128140253.000|CC1|OF DEMONSTRATORS, SEVERAL       
20110128140253.000|20110128140254.000|CC1|HUNDRED, THAT WERE TRYING TO SET
20110128140254.000|20110128140256.000|CC1|FIRE TO A POLICE CAR.

20110128140333.000|20110128140336.000|CC1|PARTICULAR LEADER, BUT AS IT IS 
20110128140336.000|20110128140339.000|CC1|GROWING, IT IS ADOPTING A MORE  
20110128140339.000|20110128140340.000|CC1|AND MORE ISLAMIC FLAVOR.

20110128140342.000|20110128140345.000|CC1|PEOPLE STOPPED AND THEN THEY

20110128140634.000|20110128140637.000|CC1|>> WELL, WE NEED TO STAND P FOR 
20110128140637.000|20110128140638.000|CC1|DEMOCRACY.                      
20110128140638.000|20110128140639.000|CC1|THAT IS A PRINCIPLE WE STAND FOR

20110128140644.000|20110128140647.000|CC1|PEACEFUL PROTESTS AND NO

20110128140702.000|20110128140705.000|CC1|REFORM, ENCOURAGE CIVIL SOCIETY,
20110128140705.000|20110128140708.000|CC1|ENCOURAGE SECULAR SOCIETIES AND

20110128140713.000|20110128140715.000|CC1|ALTERNATIVE SS THAT THE ARMY

20110128140801.000|20110128140803.000|CC1|WITHOUT HIM, WHO KNOWS WHAT

20110128140804.000|20110128140806.000|CC1|GUESS I WOULD GO TO THERE.

20110128140809.000|20110128140811.000|CC1|THIS MAKE THE ENTIRE MIDDLE     
20110128140811.000|20110128140811.000|CC1|EAST?                           
20110128140811.000|20110128140813.000|CC1|>> WELL, YOU KNOW, WE ARE SEEING
20110128140813.000|20110128140816.000|CC1|A TREND IN SOME SENSE.          
20110128140816.000|20110128140818.000|CC1|THE MIDDLE EAST AND THE
